title: Workshop on Designing Effective Online Learning Quality Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning platforms and foundational knowledge of curriculum design
context.additional_context: An online course for corporate training managers to strengthen mobile-optimized e-learning quality assessment capabilities.

learning_goals: Explain online learning quality evaluation criteria using eight dimensions (leadership management, learner profiles, etc.)
Design a quality diagnosis process applying mixed research methods (surveys + focus groups)
Develop microlearning assessment tools (quizzes/checklists) executable in smartphone environments

resources: Mobile Learning Management System (LMS) Access Permissions
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
